name: A ripped and torn straight jacket
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users charisma adequately.
It has average armour class for its type (average in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration unnoticably.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It decreases the users magical resistance strongly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
